name: RetrieveWebLinkInfo
description:
Retrieve information about a specific web link.

This tool is used to get details about a web link by its ID. Call this tool when you need information regarding a particular web link from the Box service.

parameters.name: web_link_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the web link to retrieve information about.

value_schema.description: The ID of the web link.

parameters.name: shared_link_access_details
parameters.description: The URL and optional password for accessing the shared link, formatted as `shared_link=[link]` or `shared_link=[link]&shared_link_password=[password]`. Use this to access items not explicitly shared with a user.

value_schema.description:
The URL, and optional password, for the shared link of this item.

This header can be used to access items that have not been
explicitly shared with a user.

Use the format `shared_link=[link]` or if a password is required then
use `shared_link=[link]&shared_link_password=[password]`.

This header can be used on the file or folder shared, as well as on any files
or folders nested within the item.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the box API.

parameters.name: web_link_id
parameters.description: The ID of the web link.

value_schema.description: The ID of the web link.

parameters.name: boxapi

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
